document.title:
L p
norms of a sine sum

para.p: George Pólya and Gábor Szegő, Problems and theorems in analysis, Volume II, volume 216 of Die Grundlehren der mathematischen Wissenschaften, Springer, 1976, translated from the German by C. E. Billigheimer.
